title: any help please
body: I was in a game just a little bit ago but league is under maintenance right now and i cant load into the game. what happens to me? is there any kind of penalty for disconnecting? i keep trying to get back into game but it says unavailable in the top right hand corner next to play.

replies.body: It sounds like you may have been trying to play while the new patch was prepping.  I don't believe you'll receive a penalty, but you can face issues like this during maintenance.  Be sure to bookmark the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page as we try to give a heads up on downtime.  I hope that helps!
